text: David R Glynne-Jones (born 1929), is a Welsh born male former rower, who competed for England. ==Rowing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the eights and a bronze medal in the coxed fours at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:English male rowers Category:Welsh male rowers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Living people Category:Rowers at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: David Glynne-Jones
